body_html:
Any solutions concerning the single import issue ?
Another weird fact : import torch works on the terminal but does not work on Spyder : it raises the issue
`import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):

File "", line 1, in
import torch

File "/u/sebbaghs/.conda/envs/my_root/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 53, in
from torch._C import *

ImportError: dlopen: cannot load any more object with static TLS`

body:
Any solutions concerning the single import issue ? 
Another weird fact : import torch works on the terminal but does not work on Spyder : it raises the issue 
`import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-8-c031d3dd82fc>", line 1, in <module>
    import torch

  File "/u/sebbaghs/.conda/envs/my_root/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *

ImportError: dlopen: cannot load any more object with static TLS`
